description: This API let you create unique meetingId.

postParameters.description: You can take advantage of regional API to decrease latency in video calling. `sg001` Region Code for Singapore, SG. `in002` Region Code for Mumbai, IN. `us001` Region Code for N. Carolina, US. `eu001` Region Code for Frankfurt, DE. `us002` Region Code for Ohio, US.
Customize Room id for better understanding.
